body:
**WORKSPACE setup**

```
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_java",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/releases/download/7.3.2/rules_java-7.3.2.tar.gz",
    ],
    sha256 = "3121a00588b1581bd7c1f9b550599629e5adcc11ba9c65f482bbd5cfe47fdf30",
)
load("@rules_java//java:repositories.bzl", "rules_java_dependencies", "rules_java_toolchains")
rules_java_dependencies()
rules_java_toolchains()

```

**Using the rules**

See [the source](https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/tree/7.3.2).

**WORKSPACE setup**

```
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

    name = "rules_java",
    urls = [

    ],
    sha256 = "4018e97c93f97680f1650ffd2a7530245b864ac543fd24fae8c02ba447cb2864",
)
load("@rules_java//java:repositories.bzl", "rules_java_dependencies", "rules_java_toolchains")
rules_java_dependencies()
rules_java_toolchains()

```

**Using the rules**

See [the source](https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/tree/7.3.1).

**New Features**
 - Added `java_utils.bzl` with a utility method for tokenizing javacopts

**Using the rules**

**New Features**
- Fixes incorrect reference to "//toolchains:platformclasspath"
- Updates guidance for registering toolchains declared by `local_java_repository`

```
)
```


**Using the rules**

See [the source](https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/tree/6.1.1).

**Change Log**
 - local_java_repository accepts arbitrary kwargs: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/commit/ac71e40a2bd9dc681dcf60ff3e69463d71f0c3a9
 - expose toolchain bzl sources for stardoc: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/commit/ecf792b435c6aa639182aaeeb194b7b6f3d842f3
- add bzlmod dep on rules_license: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/commit/819a33d05d64dd15f10359d27a8e43337638fef0

**WORKSPACE setup**

```
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_java",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/releases/download/6.1.0/rules_java-6.1.0.tar.gz",
    ],
    sha256 = "78e3c24f05cffed529bfcafd1f7a8d1a7b97b4a411f25d8d3b4d47d9bb980394",
)
load("@rules_java//java:repositories.bzl", "rules_java_dependencies", "rules_java_toolchains")
rules_java_dependencies()
rules_java_toolchains()

```

**Using the rules**

See [the source](https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/tree/6.1.0).

**Incompatible Changes**
 - The `remote_java_tools_darwin` repo is no longer provided

**WORKSPACE setup**

```

rules_java_toolchains()

```

**Using the rules**

See [the source](https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/tree/6.0.0).

**Change Log**
- remote_java_tools for darwin are now separately available for x86_64 and arm64

Release compatible with Bazel 3.7.2

**New Features**

- JDK 8 repositories

**WORKSPACE setup**

```
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

    name = "rules_java",

)

```

**Using the rules**

See [the source](https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/tree/3.7.2).
